name: place glyph
desc: Place a single scalable geometric objects (glyph) at an interactively determined location.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Glyph Scale
properties.desc: The place_glyph module is used to place a single scalable geometric objects (glyph) at an interactively determined location.

properties.name: X Position
properties.desc: Sets the X Position of the output glyph.

properties.name: Y Position
properties.desc: Sets the Y Position of the output glyph.

properties.name: Z Position
properties.desc: Sets the Z Position of the output glyph.

properties.name: Include Center Data
properties.desc: The Include Center Data toggle will tell the module to include the center point of each glyph as a cell data component.  This allows the user to probe onto glyph and return its center instead of the position on the outside of the glyph.

properties.name: Glyph Type
properties.desc: The Glyph Type choice allows the user to select the source for the created glyph.  Both the Generated and Directed Line options are created by the internally.  The Input Glyph option requires the InputGlyph port to be connected.

properties.name: Include Glyph Data
properties.desc: The Include Glyph Data will notify the module to keep data from the Input Glyph field as data for the output

properties.name: Generated Glyph
properties.desc: The Generated Glyph choice allows the user to select the type of glyph that is automatically generated.

properties.name: Sphere Subdivisions
properties.desc: The number of subdivisions to use for spheres. Larger numbers create more detailed sphere representations.

properties.name: Glyph Resolution
properties.desc: The resolution for generated cone, polygon, cylinder, and disk glyphs.

properties.name: Primary Axis Factor
properties.desc: The scale factor for the primary axis of the glyph.

properties.name: Secondary Axis Factor
properties.desc: The scale factor for the secondary axis of the glyph.

properties.name: Roll
properties.desc: The roll of the glyph along its primary axis.

properties.name: Alignment
properties.desc: The Alignment allows the user to choose how determine the orientation of the glyph.
